text:
Dear all,
 
      If there is a group in a slide of my ppt, the ppt2png's result seems confused, especially the text.
      How can I fix this bug?
   
     Best Regards.
     Richard.
creator: richardor@163.com
kiwiwings@apache.org
text:
Please reopen with an attachment.
I've done some work on the rendering, especially for group shapes and rotations,
so maybe this is already fixed.
